metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6519 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The SAML2 library before 1.10.4, 2.x before 2.3.5, and 3.x before 3.1.1 inSimpleSAMLphp has a Regular Expression Denial of Service vulnerability forfraction-of-seconds data in a timestamp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6519` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.15.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.2-1').
